Home Screen NEXT SKIP GOT IT
EEB3 App Welcome to the EEB3 App and thanks for trying it out! Let\'s start!
Websites All your school-related sites at your fingertips!
Assignments No need to keep things in your mind, write down your tasks!
Projects Easily find out more about the projects at our school!
Widgets Use our widgets to personalize your home screen!
Version 0.9 More than 500 hours have been spent to make this App The purpose of the EEB3 App is to facilitate the needs of the European School of Brussels III, in general, to integrate as many aspects from the school into one Android application. Copyright © AR Studios You must be the change you wish to see in the world -Mahatma Gandhi Absences Today Task Timer \"Learning from one\'s errors is more valuable than gaping at other\'s success\" Logo Designers Secondary Idea Generators French Spanish German Greek With the kind permission of And the everlasting support of \'You must be the change you wish to see in the world\' - Mahatma Gandhi Introduction Feeling lost? Can\'t find what you\'re looking for? We have a presentation video that will guide you through the app in detail. Watch the video Presentation pages Google Play Support us We\'re working hard on making this app better for you! If you\'re satisfied, please rate this app on Google Play! We would like to hear from you Your input is very valuable to us! Contact us below, and write down your suggestions and feedback! Email Updates Check for updates Tasks Share Courses About EEB3 The committee of pupils\' representatives from the international schools of Brussels OVERVIEW PARTICIPATE WEBSITES ShortFilmFestival Contact Us EEB_Green Dutch Licenses English Introductory slides Send us feedback Contact us BISSCActivity EXAMPLE Add widget Configure XLWeekly Upload a schedule to check when you\'re on the go! New task added Please wait... No internet connection RETRY I wasn\'t joking, this switch actually doesn\'t work But seriously, stop it. I\'m not even kidding, my code is gonna run out I wasn\'t made to respond to people spam-clicking me Ok, fine, maybe I was... Because my developer spent too long trying to fix me and got fed up So instead spent the rest of it making me into an easter egg Pretty original, right? I guess since you\'re still here... I\'d like to ask you a question My question is, why are you still pressing me? Is it because I\'m funny? Probably is, you know. Funnily enough, you can\'t contradict me Because I\'m merely a switch And if you start arguing with a switch... Well, let\'s just say, That people will start questioning your sanity Wow, how are you still here? You have way too much free time you know? I\'m not saying spending it, on this fabulous app, is a waste of time ahaha I\'m just saying, that perhaps... You could spend it writing some feedback below Or even rating our fantastic app I guess I should award you for your dedication So, you are now officially A dedicated EEB3 App user Since I have given you this amazing title... Please rate our app 5 stars on the Playstore! And leave a comment if you found me, the Easter egg! Have you already installed the fabulous new EEB3 App? If not, why not now? Just download it off the playstore at http://bit.ly/EEB3App Rate Us If you\'re enjoying our app, why not rate us on Google Play? Maybe later As a dedicated EEB3 App user, please rate us on Google Play! Join the Community Go follow us on our Facebook page and receive alerts on the latest EEB3 App updates! Follow Leave a Suggestion We\'re counting on your feedback to make the EEB3 App better! Share us your ideas, we\'ll see what we can do! Give Suggestion Remind me later Tell your friends Do you like this app? Why not share it to your friends so they can join in on the fun? I have no friends Thank you We\'ve recently noticed that you have opened this app 100 times! Thank you for your interest and support to our app! If you want to, you can contact the developer, who shall congratulate you on our facebook page! Don\'t worry, you really deserve it! No thanks Yes please! Send in donations Want to fund future updates? We\'re working intensively to bring you the best, so help us keep going! Donate New schedule uploaded We\'ve put in some insane time to bring you this app. Really, the purpose of it is to facilitate the needs of you, the students and teachers of the European School of Brussels III! Add tasks Don\'t forget your tasks! To add a task, simply press the button above. If you\'d like to delete a task, just swipe it! Add Task Chief Developer All your endless ideas, and quality feedback is why we have an intuitive EEB3 App today. Thank you! Above all, your perfectionism made the app\'s UI quite stunning, so thank you for your priceless contributions! Inspirational Figure Your inspiring lessons since the start of last year are what gave me the confidence to venture into such a feat. You\'re still modest about it, but your experience with the Orbis app and advice on the IDE is what motivated me to start this project. As a designer, you\'re efficient and bursting with ideas, and you\'re clearly the reason we have such a great app logo. Your help, and the work you have done is what opened me to the great digital art that a student can be capable of. I can\'t thank the team behind the languages enough; their efficiency, their support, all of it made the app better than ever before. You\'re always cheerful and always dedicated to your team. Thank you for all your hard work! I\'d like to thank you for your active participation throughout our project, and especially during the holidays. Great work! You\'re always very eager to help out, and have taken a great interest in the project. Thank you for your support! Thank you for the contributions you provided to our team, and your support during the making of the app. Your feedback alongside the translations that you sent in helped bring the app to a high standard. Thank you for everything! Thank you for giving your first impressions of the app, including the valuable feedback provided which has been integrated into the app! Thank you for helping out in the project, and trying to volunteer wherever you could. Your support was very appreciated! Deputy Head of the Secondary You once told me that many people had spoken to you about an eeb3 app, but not one had realised a project as such. This is one of the aspects that, alongside your encouragement, fuelled this ridiculously intensive project. Thank you for this, and all the support you have given to my projects and several other student intiatives! School Director As the new school Director, you have already shown to everyone that you are eager to support school projects, both aiding and attending them as a symbol of encouragement and respect. Thank you for your incredible support! Everlasting Support From the very beginning, you supported me, gave me ideas, instantly provided logos and assets and much, much more. For these reasons, I believe that you deserve yet another spot in the credits, not only as a mark of honour, but a symbol of gratitude from my side. And finally, thank you for everything; for recognising my initial project, to motivating and encouraging me to produce this app to the state it is today, always pushing me to my limits. As a student, you have served as my mentor and as a person, you have served as my idol. Thank you once again! Feeling lost? Can\'t find what you\'re looking for? We have some useful slides that will guide you through the app. Go follow us on Facebook to get the behind-the-scenes of this app, whilst receiving alerts on all our future updates! Follow on Facebook Upcoming updates Would you like to help fund future updates, to make this app even better than it already is? Send us some money to keep us going! Donate money Got any suggestions? If you have any ideas on this app that you\'d like to share, please feel free to let us know. Send us an email Events The Student Courses is a project that seeks to give students the opportunity to teach and learn from fellow pupils. A short film festival where students are the film directors and can display their cinematography skills. The EEB.GREEN Project is a student initiative to make our school more cleaner and sustainable. A newsletter that gives updates on the latest initiatives and improvements done in the International Schools of Brussels The school\'s online newspaper, where you can read over all the articles written by our own students! Certain icons are used from the Google material icons collection, which are available under the Apache Version 2.0 license. Visit Material.io/icons/ Certain icons are used from the Icons8 icons collection, which are available under the Creative Commons Attribution-NoDerivs 3.0 Unported license. Visit Icons8.com Certain images are used from the Pixabay collection, which are available under the Creative Commons CC0 license. Visit Pixabay.com Upload Schedule No schedule uploaded For best results, take a screenshot of your timetable from SMS The current language that is displayed to the user Notifications that you shall receive from the app View help & feedback section Resolve your queries and send us your feedback View about section Learn more about the process of making this app View credits section See the people who made this app into a reality View your schedules Upload an image, such as a screenshot of your timetable, so that you can rapidly check your schedule from here.
